inclusion.criterion: Body mass index (BMI) greater than or equal to 25
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of sleepiness which may constitute risk to self or others
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic kidney, thyroid, or liver disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Coexistence of sleep disorders other than OSA
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of previous surgery to upper airway (except those for nasal problems)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous surgical or current medical treatment for OSA
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA, and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. She is on BiPap with 5L and has a history of CAD, CHF, DM2, ventricular tachycardia, hypothyroidism, schizophrenia, and Pneumonia treated in [**4-7**] at [**Hospital1 **].
